Crucially, its description explicitly lists Roy Hawkins and Rick Darnell as Composer/Lyricist, which perfectly aligns with the provided soundtrack metadata. While it is a live version and not explicitly linked to 'The Fugitive' movie, it is the most precise and authentic representation of the specified song and artists among the given candidates. Candidate 3 is also an official upload with matching composers, but it is a 'Medley' which makes Candidate 5 a more direct match for the standalone song title.
